content.html: Was off work yesterday as I could barely get out of bed. Nothing has knocked me off my feet like that since I caught covid last year so I went for a PCR just in case. And now I’ve got to self-isolate as yup, I’ve got covid. Again. This is going to be a struggle
content.value:
Was off work yesterday as I could barely get out of bed. Nothing has knocked me off my feet like that since I caught covid last year so I went for a PCR just in case.

And now I’ve got to self-isolate as yup, I’ve got covid. Again.

This is going to be a struggle
